mapper.insert:
select gallery_seq.nextval from dual
insert into Gallery (G_NO, MT_NAME, U_ID, G_HNAME, G_LNAME, G_HPRICE, G_LPRICE, G_CONTENT, G_REG, G_EDIT, G_STATUS, G_SALES, G_LIKE, G_READCOUNT, G_TAG1, G_TYPE) VALUES (#{G_NO}, #{MT_NAME}, #{U_ID}, #{G_HNAME}, #{G_LNAME}, 1000, #{G_LPRICE}, #{G_CONTENT}, sysdate, sysdate, #{G_STATUS}, #{G_SALES}, #{G_LIKE}, #{G_READCOUNT}, #{G_TAG1}, #{G_TYPE})

insert into Metadata (G_NO, M_IMGLENS, M_IMGCAMERA, M_IMGHQLY, M_IMGLQLY, M_APERTURE, M_ISO, M_FLENGTH, M_SHUTTERSPEED) VALUES (#{G_NO}, #{M_IMGLENS}, #{M_IMGCAMERA}, #{M_IMGHQLY}, #{M_IMGLQLY}, #{M_APERTURE}, #{M_ISO}, #{M_FLENGTH}, #{M_SHUTTERSPEED})
mapper.select: select * from gallery where g_readCount = (select max(G_READCOUNT) from gallery) and ROWNUM = 1 order by g_reg desc
select * from gallery where g_like = (select max(G_LIKE) from gallery) and ROWNUM = 1 order by g_reg desc
select * from gallery where g_sales = (select max(G_SALES) from gallery) and ROWNUM = 1 order by g_reg desc

select count(*) from
(select rownum r, G.*, M.* from (select * from gallery) g, (select * from metadata) m where g.G_NO = m.g_no(+)
and (g.G_TAG1 like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or g.MT_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or g.U_ID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.M_IMGLENS like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.M_IMGCAMERA like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.M_APERTURE like '%'||to_char(#{keyword})||'%' or m.M_FLENGTH like '%'||to_char(#{keyword})||'%')
and g.g_no > 0 and g.g_status < 2 AND rownum <= 1*12 order by g.G_REG desc ) where r > (1 - 1) * 12

select MT_NAME, G_NO from (select rownum r, G.* from (select * from gallery) g, (select * from metadata) m where g.G_NO = m.G_NO(+)
and (g.G_TAG1 like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or g.MT_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or g.U_ID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.M_IMGLENS like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.M_IMGCAMERA like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.M_APERTURE like '%'||to_char(#{keyword})||'%' or m.M_FLENGTH like '%'||to_char(#{keyword})||'%')
and g.g_no > 0 and g.g_status < 2 AND rownum <= 1*12 order by g.G_REG desc ) where r > (1 - 1) * 12
